verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against רוֹעֵ֣י <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Ei against the shepherds יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֩ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to לָרֹעִ֜ים <S%H7462><s%> la-ro-'Im unto the shepherds כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD ה֤וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho Woe רֹעֵֽי־ <S%H7462><s%> ro-'ei- [be] to the shepherds יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu have been רֹעִ֣ים <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Im that do feed אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon, cattle יִרְע֖וּ <S%H7462><s%> yir-'U themselves should not the shepherds הָרֹעִֽים׃ <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im. feed

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֵ֤לֶב <S%H2459><s%> ha-Che-lev the fat תֹּאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> to-Che-lu Ye eat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַצֶּ֣מֶר <S%H6785><s%> hatz-Tze-mer you with the wool תִּלְבָּ֔שׁוּ <S%H3847><s%> til-Ba-shu, and ye clothe הַבְּרִיאָ֖ה <S%H1277><s%> hab-be-ri-'Ah them that are fed תִּזְבָּ֑חוּ <S%H2076><s%> tiz-Ba-chu; ye kill הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon not the flock לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo without תִרְעֽוּ׃ <S%H7462><s%> tir-'U. [but] ye feed

אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנַּחְלוֹת֩ <S%H2470><s%> han-nach-lOt The diseased לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor חִזַּקְתֶּ֜ם <S%H2388><s%> chiz-zak-Tem have ye not strengthened וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחוֹלָ֣ה <S%H2470><s%> ha-cho-Lah that which was sick לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor רִפֵּאתֶ֗ם <S%H7495><s%> rip-pe-Tem, neither have ye healed וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֙רֶת֙ <S%H7665><s%> ve-lan-nish-Be-ret [that which was] broken לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor חֲבַשְׁתֶּ֔ם <S%H2280><s%> cha-vash-Tem, neither have ye bound up וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַנִּדַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H5080><s%> han-nid-Da-chat that which was driven away לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor הֲשֵׁבֹתֶ֔ם <S%H7725><s%> ha-she-vo-Tem, neither have ye brought again וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאֹבֶ֖דֶת <S%H6><s%> ha-'o-Ve-det that which was lost לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor בִקַּשְׁתֶּ֑ם <S%H1245><s%> vik-kash-Tem; neither have ye sought וּבְחָזְקָ֛ה <S%H2394><s%> u-ve-cha-ze-Kah but with force רְדִיתֶ֥ם <S%H7287><s%> re-di-Tem have ye ruled אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam וּבְפָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H6531><s%> u-ve-Fa-rech. and with cruelty

וַתְּפוּצֶ֖ינָה <S%H6327><s%> vat-te-fu-Tzei-nah And they were scattered מִבְּלִ֣י <S%H1097><s%> mib-be-Li lack רֹעֶ֑ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh; because [there is] no shepherd וַתִּהְיֶ֧ינָה <S%H1961><s%> vat-tih-Yei-nah became לְאָכְלָ֛ה <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah and they became meat לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol every חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat to all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of the field וַתְּפוּצֶֽינָה׃ <S%H6327><s%> vat-te-fu-Tzei-nah. when they were scattered

יִשְׁגּ֤וּ <S%H7686><s%> yish-Gu wandered צֹאנִי֙ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni My sheep בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim, through all the mountains וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every גִּבְעָ֣ה <S%H1389><s%> giv-'Ah hill רָמָ֑ה <S%H7311><s%> ra-Mah; and upon every high וְעַ֨ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon all the face הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth נָפֹ֣צוּ <S%H6327><s%> na-Fo-tzu was scattered צֹאנִ֔י <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni, yea my flock וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there דּוֹרֵ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> do-Resh and none did search וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein was no מְבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Kesh. or seek

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore רֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Im, Therefore ye shepherds שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- [As] I live אָ֜נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni I נְאֻ֣ם׀ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because הֱיֽוֹת־ <S%H1961><s%> he-yot- has become צֹאנִ֣י׀ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni surely because my flock לָבַ֡ז <S%H957><s%> la-Vaz became a prey וַתִּֽהְיֶינָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> vat-tih-yei-Nah become צֹאנִ֨י <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni and my flock לְאָכְלָ֜ה <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah became meat לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat to every beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of the field מֵאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> me-'Ein lack רֹעֶ֔ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh, because [there was] no shepherd וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not דָרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1875><s%> da-re-Shu search רֹעַ֖י <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Ai neither did my shepherds אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹאנִ֑י <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni; for my flock וַיִּרְע֤וּ <S%H7462><s%> vai-yir-'U but the shepherds הָֽרֹעִים֙ <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im fed אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צֹאנִ֖י <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni not my flock לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo and did not רָעֽוּ׃ <S%H7462><s%> ra-'U. themselves and fed ס sa-Mek

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore הָֽרֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im, Therefore O ye shepherds שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- I am against הָרֹעִ֜ים <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im Behold I [am] against the shepherds וְֽדָרַשְׁתִּ֧י <S%H1875><s%> ve-da-rash-Ti and I will require אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹאנִ֣י <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni my flock מִיָּדָ֗ם <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Dam, at their hand וְהִשְׁבַּתִּים֙ <S%H7673><s%> ve-hish-bat-Tim and cause them to cease מֵרְע֣וֹת <S%H7462><s%> me-re-'ot from feeding צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> Tzon, the flock וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יִרְע֥וּ <S%H7462><s%> yir-'U neither shall the shepherds ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od anymore הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im feed אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam; וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <S%H5337><s%> ve-hitz-tzal-Ti themselves any more for I will deliver צֹאנִי֙ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni my flock מִפִּיהֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> mip-pi-Hem, from their mouth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not תִהְיֶ֥יןָ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-na become לָהֶ֖ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah that they may not be meat ס sa-Mek

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki For כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD הִנְנִי־ <S%H2005><s%> hin-ni- behold אָ֕נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni Myself וְדָרַשְׁתִּ֥י <S%H1875><s%> ve-da-rash-Ti Behold I [even] I will both search אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹאנִ֖י <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni my sheep וּבִקַּרְתִּֽים׃ <S%H1239><s%> u-vik-kar-Tim. and seek them out

כְּבַקָּרַת֩ <S%H1243><s%> ke-vak-ka-Rat seeketh out רֹעֶ֨ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh As a shepherd עֶדְר֜וֹ <S%H5739><s%> ed-Ro his flock בְּיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> be-yom- in the day הֱיוֹת֤וֹ <S%H1961><s%> he-yo-To become בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> ve-toch- that he is among צֹאנוֹ֙ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-No his sheep נִפְרָשׁ֔וֹת <S%H6567><s%> nif-ra-Shot, [that are] scattered כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so אֲבַקֵּ֣ר <S%H1239><s%> 'a-vak-Ker so will I seek out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹאנִ֑י <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni; my sheep וְהִצַּלְתִּ֣י <S%H5337><s%> ve-hitz-tzal-Ti and will deliver אֶתְהֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Hem, מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all הַמְּקוֹמֹת֙ <S%H4725><s%> ham-me-ko-Mot them out of all places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to which נָפֹ֣צוּ <S%H6327><s%> na-Fo-tzu where they have been scattered שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, in it בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day עָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> 'a-Nan in the cloudy וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <S%H6205><s%> va-'a-ra-Fel. and dark

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣ים <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Tim And I will bring them out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּים֙ <S%H6908><s%> ve-kib-batz-Tim and gather מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-Tzot, them from the countries וַהֲבִיאֹתִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> va-ha-vi-'o-Tim and will bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַדְמָתָ֑ם <S%H127><s%> 'ad-ma-Tam; them to their own land וּרְעִיתִים֙ <S%H7462><s%> u-re-'i-Tim and feed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei them upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בָּאֲפִיקִ֕ים <S%H650><s%> ba-'a-fi-Kim by the rivers וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all מוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H4186><s%> mo-she-Vei and in all the inhabited places הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the country

בְּמִרְעֶה־ <S%H4829><s%> be-mir-'eh- pasture טּוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> tOv them in a good אֶרְעֶ֣ה <S%H7462><s%> 'er-'Eh I will feed אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, וּבְהָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> u-ve-ha-Rei mountains מְרֽוֹם־ <S%H4791><s%> me-rom- and upon the high יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become נְוֵהֶ֑ם <S%H5116><s%> ne-ve-Hem; shall their fold שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> sham There תִּרְבַּ֙צְנָה֙ <S%H7257><s%> tir-Batz-nah be there shall they lie בְּנָ֣וֶה <S%H5116><s%> be-Na-veh fold טּ֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov, in a good וּמִרְעֶ֥ה <S%H4829><s%> u-mir-'Eh pasture שָׁמֵ֛ן <S%H8082><s%> sha-Men and [in] a fat תִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <S%H7462><s%> tir-'Ei-nah shall they feed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אֶרְעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> 'er-'Eh I will feed צֹאנִי֙ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ni my flock וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni and I אַרְבִּיצֵ֔ם <S%H7257><s%> 'ar-bi-Tzem, and I will cause them to lie down נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD
